ol.li:
Stay up to date
Latest News

div.class: inner col col24 first last idb3d6d141-d4c7-46cd-aa46-37657f18f109

div.div: Requiring the use of cloth face masks at work. Read on...

Do you have an unused C-PAP or BI-PAP machine? Please consider donating your unused machine to the RI Ventilator Supply Task Force. Go to https://www.ventilatorproject.org/ - now to learn more and find your closest drop-off point. Additional Info...
The Town Council has rescheduled several public hearings that had been advertised for specific dates. The new dates are as follows: Read on...

h4.a: A Message from Town Manager James Tierney

div.div: April 3, 2020 Read on...

h4.a: A Message from Town Manager James Tierney

div.div: COVID-19 and the Town of Narragansett Read on...

h4.a: Special COVID-19 email address for questions and concerns

div.div:
To assist you voice your questions and concerns about any activity in town that may affect the COVID-19 emergency, the Police Department has created a special E-mail address.
Please send your correspondence to Covid19@narragansettri.gov Read on...
Please click the link below for important COVID-19 resources. Additional Info...
Please see the attached notice regarding emergency parking restrictions. Read on...
Please note that the Narragansett Eco-Depot event on May 2nd has been cancelled.

h4.a: State of Rhode Island Executive Order 20-18: Extension of Declaration of Disaster Emergency

div.div: Please see State of Rhode Island's Executive Order 20-18: Extension of Declaration of Disaster Emergency. Additional Info...

h4.a: Rose Hill Regional Transfer Station Information

div.div: Important information regarding the Rose Hill Regional Transfer Station. Additional Info...
Please see Executive Order 20-03 which supersedes Executive Orders 20-01 & 20-02. Additional Info...
State of RI Executive Order 20-16: Authorizing Waiver and Medicaid State Plan Amendments and Adjustments to Essential Provider Rates. Additional Info...

In order to limit access and prevent problems with people congregating by the seawall in violation of the Governor’s Stay at Home Order and to prevent the community spread of COVID-19, an emergency parking restriction has been put in place on Ocean Rd. Read on...
Please see the attached press release regarding rentals in Narragansett. Additional Info...
The Town of Narragansett is directing all residents to stay-in-place unless traveling to work, medical treatment, or to obtain necessities. Read on...
There is a shortage of personal protective equipment in the state! Read on...

h4.a: Press release regarding travel from New York

div.div: Please see the attached press release regarding travel from New York. Additional Info...
Court is closed to the public until the court session scheduled for May 28, 2020. Documents should be either mailed or deposited in the drop box in front of Town Hall. Read on...

h4.a: Notice for out of state travelers, visitors and seasonal residents

div.div: Please read the attached press release for out of state travelers, visitors and seasonal residents to self-quarantine. Additional Info...

h4.a: Notice on domestic travel into Narragansett

div.div: Please read the attached notice on domestic travel into Narragansett. Additional Info...
Court has been postponed through May 22nd. All defendants will be notified of their re-scheduled court date. Please continue to check back as future dates are subject to change. Read on...
Don’t Flush Wipes or paper towels!! Just because it says “Flushable” doesn’t mean you should! Please dispose of wet wipes, baby wipes and paper towels in the trash. Read on...

The Town of Narragansett has begun the 2020 full property revaluations. Inspectors from Northeast Revaluation Group LLC have begun the first phase of the project which consists of measuring and inspecting properties. Please see below for more info. Read on...

h4.a: Absentee Voting for RESCHEDULED Presidential Preference Primary

div.div: Absentee ballot applications are available NOW for voting in the Presidential Preference Primary on June 2, 2020. Read on...
